column1: Kata Robata////Reason behind the rating: food was fantastic
column2: but knocked off a star for 1) the more "standard fare" such as spicy tuna/spicy salmon rolls were only okay
column3: 2) some of the food was quite overpriced
column4: and 3) service could have been a bit more attentive. While the waitstaff was kind and knowledgeable
column5: one of the things I pay attention to is how often my water gets refilled.
